text: Then a bit more of this.

ALYA: So, we have a former
holder who went by Hawk Moth

then Shadow Moth,
and finally, Monarch.

So he was defeated and a new
holder got his Miraculous.
We know the new holder is...

We know nothing!
It's even worse than before!

Is that so bad? We didn't know
a lot about Monarch

That's not true!
We know lots about Monarch.

His goal was seizing Cat Noir's
and my Miraculous
so he could be granted one wish.

We know zilch
about this supervillian

and who knows why!
This is a disaster!

Except this time, you've got
a whole super team on your side.

What if this supervillain
akumatizes a holder?

They'd lose their Miraculous!
I've put the world in danger!

ALYA: We've all been akumtized
before.

and learned how to deal
better with our emotions.

Trust me, we can resist
if this villain attacks us,

I'm lucky to have such good
people and friends around me.

Let's get ready for the movies.
Hurry!

Darn, it completely
went out of my head.

Don't cancel. I need you.
Please, please!

Marinette, you and Adrien
are a legit couple for real now
You don't need us to go too.

Easy for you to say. You
and Nino are so perfect together

Things are brand new
for us as a couple

And Adrien is so perfect too.
I don't wanna mess things up.
So I need to watch you guys

so I know how to act perfectly
around my perfect boyfriend.

Are you telling me you're afraid
of spending time alone

MARINETTE:
In the daytime, I'm Marinette,

just a normal girl
with a normal life,

but there's something about me
that no one knows yet

♪ Up to the test
When things go wrong ♪

♪ The power of love
Always so strong ♪

DRIVER: Dear passengers,
there's a crack in the road.

The wheels are stuck.
Everyone, stay calm.

Ladybug was clear. Unless
it's an akumatized villain
we can transform and help out.

Marinette, they have to.
They're superheroes.

Yeah, yeah, I know.
But careful, okay?

Don't worry, girl. Everything
is gonna be all right.

This way! Head over
to the secured area, please!

We don't need to be superheroes
to be a super couple.

Even with superpowers, this
is hard.

Huge thanks to you two.
Paris is lucky to have you.

It's awesome we can be Carapace
and Rena Rouge together.

Too bad Adrien and Marinette
can't share a bond.

They just have
to get comfortable sharing.

What
if we let them enjoy their date,

Right. Their relationship is
new. They must give it a chance.
And I could use the time

to investigate
the mysterious new holder

of the Butterfly Miraculous.
We know nothing about them.

We could even be a duo
of reporters, you and me.

MARINETTE: Where are you?
Why haven't you come back?

(phone buzzes) We're busy.
Have fun without us.

It's for your own good.
You'll see. Love you.

(laughs) So, looks like we're
spending the rest of the day
Oh, okay. That's good, isn't it?

Yeah, that's g... good. Very
good. Very, very, very good.
I heard this movie is great.

(screams)
Oh, excuse me. I'm so sorry.

Whoa, Ryuko! She'll be using her
rain powers to put out a fire.

We're so lucky to have
superheroes in Paris

don't you think, Marinette?
Hm? Marinette?

You have everything
you always wanted

-Your team can look after Paris.
-(phone buzzes)

...which gives you more time
to be with Adrien.

So why turn into Ladybug
right now?

and the guardian
transforms into Ladybug.

Look at that. I was
making it rain for the fire.

MARINETTE:
Don't worry, I'm on it.

I bought the tickets.
But the movie's almost over.

-Where were you?
-I went for... drinks, but...

but they ran out of them.
Drinks.
Let's get a drink in that cafe!

Ms. Mayor, you were one of
the first to get akumatized

by the new holder
of the Butterfly Miraculous.

-I was.
-Do you have any memories of it?

I remember how I felt
prior to the akumatization, yes.

I was extremely worried
about our baby,
and that's when I heard a voice.
Was it a man or a woman?

It wasn't clear, like several
voices blending together.

Two hot chocolates
and some cookies

by any chance,
did it say its name?

I remember nothing
after the akumatization.
Only the moment I came to.

Ladybug and Cat Noir were there,
and it was over.

Pistachio-shrimp cookies, like
the lady and man have there.

Right?
Original, just like us, hm.
Sorry! I didn't mean to do that.

I wanted to... not do that,
at least. Uh. I'm sorry.

Don't worry.
But is everything all right?

Why wouldn't it be? We're here
together, doing it on our own.

Oh, look, Marinette.
It's Miss Hound.

Sorry, I don't have time.
Later, okay?

Well,
I didn't have time to do mu...

Oh no,
uh, I mean, she'll be back.

She's like that.
She comes and goes.

I thought I would multiply
and shrink under he car

-but I didn't have a chance.
-There you go.

Always there for you, Polymouse.
Don't forget it.

Of course not.
Why would you ask?

You could let Polymouse
handle this.

"As long as someone isn't
akumatized, do what you want"?

But it's nice to have help.
Where were you, anyway?

I haven't seen you all day.
I haven't stopped.

Hold on. I thought you handed
out all the Miraculous

so you wouldn't have
to take care of everything.

-And get some private time.
-Well, I have no choice.

They could get hurt
or akumatized.
As long as we're in the dark

there is no way
I'll the others on their own.
Phong, Phong! Look what I drew!

MAN:
Never lose sight of customers.
Maya, can't you see I'm busy?

We take care
of them and watch them.

(Lila's echoing voice) Hello,
Maya. Forgive my intrusion

but I seem to feel
a huge disappointment.

No one is interested
in your drawings

Do you feel ignored,
like no one sees you?

LILA: I know
what would be fitting.

For no one to be able
to ignore your drawings anymore.

I can give you those powers,
only if you agree, of course.

LILA: And what should I
call you?

We know the victims
forgot everything

This is a seriously
tough investigation

but if there is anyone
who can handle it, it's you.

(Maya giggles)
Look at my pretty drawings!

-Shall we go?
-If it's an akumatized villain
we must wait to be called.

I know you're busy with Adrien
but we have an emergency.

Pretend
it wouldn't break any rules.

We're going
to be road safety pros!
So, how are things with you?

Oh, all good. Especially
in the love department.

Things are awesome
with me and my boyfriend.

I perfectly know
how a couple works.

I'm not afraid of disappointing
him or doing things wrong.
Well, I... guess we're fine too.

Where are you?
I'm with Carapace

and there's
an akumatized villain in town!

Uh, we've been... super busy
but we're on our way.

(Maya gasps) It's Ladybug.
Hi, Ladybug! Look what I drew!

We have to find her akumatized
item ASAP. Lucky charm!

I bet the Ultrakuma's
in the book.
I bet it's in the pen.

but it would be better
if they stayed on the page.

You don't like my drawings,
do you?

Uh, on the contrary.
I love them.

Whatever the akumatized object
is, we must be sly.

This kid won't let go
of her art supplies.

Carapace, trap her in a shield
to prevent her from fleeing.
I'll wrap my yo-yo around it.

She'll be tied up. All you do
is take her notebook and pencil.
It's not nice to lock me up.

I just want to show
my pretty drawings!
A box for art supplies? Uh!
I'll get things to fill it.

What if we use this time to find
out about the Butterfly villain

before the Illustrator
is de-akumatized and forgets?

ALYA: Say, these are
really pretty drawings.

Does the person
who gave you powers like them?

Mm, I don't know.
Hey, what's your name again?

But if you want
to keep on drawing

then you can't tell Ladybug
and Cat Noir anything about me.

Won't the man who gave you
powers tell you his name?

There are several voices,
aren't there?

LILA: If you don't keep our
secret, I'll take the book back.

LILA: But if you get me Ladybug
and Cat Noir's Miraculous,
I'll let you keep it forever.

Tell us what the voices want.
We can help you.

Carapace Express! Talk about
same-day shipping, am I right?

Now do as she says. Leave
her be.

(grunts) You see, Illustrator?
It's just you and me now.

(gasps) Check out
this beautiful art box!

You may have just a sketchbook,
but it's a magic one.
Huh, your case isn't even magic!

(gasps) Yeah, okay.
I'll have the magic case.

LILA: Don't do that,
Illustrator. It's a trap.

I was sad. No one
was looking at my drawings.

Then the voices started talking
to me in my head. (sobs)

But I can't remember
anything after that.

I understand
why that made you angry

but when our emotions
get the best of us,
If the voices contact you again

this magical charm will remind
you that you can resist.

Yes, very pretty.
Is this one of me?

Here. You can keep it for
saving me from the evil voices.

ALYA: We still no nothing
about the new holder

of the Butterfly Miraculous.
My investigation's a flop.

Not true. We now know
they're changing their voice

but won't tell victims
their name

and don't want us
to know what they're after.
I wish I could have helped you.

Carapace and you have helped me
a lot already.

I, however,
should have held back.

I don't need to do everything
on my own all the time

when I have a super team
I can rely on.
If anything ever happens to me

Tikki will bring you my earrings
and you'll be the new guardian.

Alya Cesaire, do you agree
to officially become my deputy?

Thanks to this jewel, you will
have access to my whole memory.

from the day Master Fu
appointed me guardian
to the day I renounce my title.

What about me?
What will I become without Alya?

The new guardian
will assign you a holder.

Don't worry.
I'll pick someone awesome.

Thanks for your trust, but I
hope I never have to replace you

as something
would've happened to you.

It's time you become
a super couple.

I'm sorry for not doing things
the way you need me to.

If you no longer want to be
my girlfriend, I'll understand.

No, I'm so,
so happy we're together.
I'm sorry if I... I... uh...

I don't really know
how to behave
I'm afraid of messing things up

so I try to control everything,
but I'm just ruining everything.
This is all brand new to me too,

but we can
figure it out together. Okay?

You'll know nothing about me,
about us, about them.

I'm everywhere. I'm nowhere.
I'm a chameleon
